publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3842 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations-That the Justice 1 Committee, in consideration of the draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2003, recommends that the Regulations be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
